document_data.mainbody:
'''''Letters to a Sheltered Son''''' was a [[book]] written by [[Oblut Thoim]] of [[Teziir]] in the early 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Now in that grim, gray city are women called [[pleasure queen|pleasure-queens]], who keep house amid furs and [[silk]]s and [[perfume]]s and have mastered the art of snaring a man in the street with one dark glance of promise. Disgusting enchantressesâ€“they're the only reason I ever ride north of [[Selgaunt]], I tell you.''|Excerpt from ''Letters to a Sheltered Son''}}
document_data.History: ''Letters to a Sheltered Son'' was an autobiographical collection of letters published in the {{YearlinkName|1333}}.{{Cite web/The Candlekeep Collection}}
